name: beep
description: Beep is an offline data transformation tool, heavily influenced by the Mac tool [Boop](https://boop.okat.best).

scripts.build: npm run build:plugins && npm run build:base && npm run build:core && npm run build:gui
scripts.clean: npm run clean:base && npm run clean:core && npm run clean:gui && npm run clean:plugins
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.rebuild:base: npm run clean:base && npm run build:base
scripts.rebuild:core: npm run clean:core && npm run build:core
scripts.rebuild:gui: npm run clean:gui && npm run build:gui
scripts.rebuild:plugins: npm run clean:plugins && npm run build:plugins
scripts.start:gui: npm run build && npm run start:gui:nobuild

author: Mark Benson <thealternator89@gmail.com>
